Research Committee 42

Social Psychology

AI series: Ensuring new AI technologies help everyone thrive

Anna Demming looks at how our handling of these AI systems can be optimized for society as a whole, beyond the direct goals of AI developers.

No matching items

    The aim of RC42 is to contribute to the development of theory and research in social psychology on an international level, uniting professional and scientific interests of its members to work together on a local, regional, and international level.

      Generative AI is based on neural networks, which are so-called ‘black boxes’. This makes it difficult or impossible to explain the inner workings of the model which has potential implications if in the future you are challenged to justify decisioning or guidance based on the model.

      Excerpt from the UK government’s framework for the use of generative AI
